jorton@redhat.com
text:
You probably have headers from the old version of httpd in -I/usr/local/include
and hence are suffering from bug 18959.

Yep! It was just that. 

I moved /usr/local/include to another location and it compiled right!

Seems a test to be added in "configure". 



*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 18959 ***
creator: gobin@gobinjf.be
